about_the_game:
This Modern themed package can be used to create laser-shooting and space-exploring Female characters. Cyborgs and aliens can also be encountered.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 12 skins
- 5 colourable hairs
- 5 hair presets
- 6 hats with hair
- 2 hats

- 21 boots
- 7 full sets of clothes
- 13 pants
- 3 suits
- 23 tops
- 6 underwear

- 1 back item
- 7 bracelets
- 3 chest items
- 2 headwears
- 4 thigh items
- 1 tights
- 5 waist items
- 14 left-handed weapons
- 19 right-handed weapons
- 1 wing

Additional content available to all packs:
- 7 backgrounds
- 5 companions
- 1 item

- 2 auras
- 2 effects
- 1 token

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1370 x 770 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution
